originalText.text: Iâ€™ve gone here a few times and it is usually fine, but leaving 2 stars because I left my laundry here once and they lost a nice dress shirt of mine, which I presume someone stole.  It was the nicest shirt in my laundry.  They didnâ€™t lose some cheap article of clothing.  And when I asked about it they only gave me a small discount of $10 or so.  The shirt was worth way more than that.

originalText.text: I have been a customer of BON CLEANERS for so long that I cannot remember when I first used its services.  My experience during this time has been more than satisfactory.  My shirts and pants have always been superbly done and Kim at the front desk has been a delight and always helpful.  I would be very disappointed if anything happened to them.

originalText.text:
BON CLEANERS has changed!!
Kim, at the front desk could not be more helpful and kind. My clothes are delivered and beautifully cleaned.
I have not as yet used their tailor but there is a new attitude and effort to change their approach.
Bon Cleaners has been our neighbor for many years.
I recommend Bon Cleaners highly

originalText.text:
5/5 would recommend! Went to Bon French cleaners on a tight timeline. They got everything done early and organized. I got a dress shirt, dress pants, and a gown dry cleaned there.

The person I worked with was extremely friendly. I saw some reviews from quite awhile ago that worried me but I had an awesome time. I will definitely be returning very soon.

text.text:

The person I worked with was extremely friendly. I saw some reviews from quite awhile ago that worried me but I had an awesome time. I will definitely be returning very soon.
